name: RACCOON MEGA FIGHTING
description:
RACCOON MEGA FIGHTING, THE PERFECT GAME FOR RACCOON HATERS

Anyway, Raccoon Mega Fighting is an FPS developed on a made-in-home C++ game engine by 4 Game Developer students. It is not a real game, but just a demonstration of our simple game engine called 'Exengine'.  

Enjoy your raccoon-shooting session, but I want to ask you something. Who is behind the gun? A raccoon too, maybe...

Credits:

- fedjoyd5

- Fura-i

- Toraito

- Le Ch3valier
